html: Today, I’m reintroducing the #MarijuanaJusticeAct with my colleagues @SenBooker and @RepRoKhanna, which will: End the federal marijuana prohibition Expunge non-violent federal marijuana convictions Invest in communities devastated by the failed #WarOnDrugs
text:
Today, I’m reintroducing the #MarijuanaJusticeAct with my colleagues @SenBooker and @RepRoKhanna, which will:
 End the federal marijuana prohibition   
 Expunge non-violent federal marijuana convictions
 Invest in communities devastated by the failed #WarOnDrugs

It’s important to remember that this shouldn’t be a partisan issue: aiding the rapid starvation of 6 million Yemenis stands as the antithesis to our country’s stance as a democratic nation. 

Let’s pass my legislation for a historic win in the name of democracy and decency

html: I also met with Bethany, an attorney on furlough from the EPA. Bethany and her husband have had to dip into their savings to keep their household afloat. They've tried not to worry their 10-year-old daughter, but she's picked up on the reality that things are uncertain for mom.

html: It is disgraceful that Gary, Chad, and other innocent Americans are being used as political pawns by this president. Families can’t afford to go weeks on end without a paycheck. President Trump needs to stop holding this country hostage and come to the table.
text: It is disgraceful that Gary, Chad, and other innocent Americans are being used as political pawns by this president. Families can’t afford to go weeks on end without a paycheck. President Trump needs to stop holding this country hostage and come to the table.

html: Chad just applied for unemployment assistance for the first time. He told me that the shutdown “is stressful and uncertain at best. I am trying my best to stay positive.”
text: Chad just applied for unemployment assistance for the first time. He told me that the shutdown “is stressful and uncertain at best. I am trying my best to stay positive.”

html: I also spoke with Chad, who works for the FDA. He and his husband rely on both their incomes to afford their 1 bedroom apartment in Oakland. Their rent for January is covered, but if Chad isn’t back to work by the end of the month, he isn’t sure how they’ll pay for February.
text: I also spoke with Chad, who works for the FDA. He and his husband rely on both their incomes to afford their 1 bedroom apartment in Oakland. Their rent for January is covered, but if Chad isn’t back to work by the end of the month, he isn’t sure how they’ll pay for February.

html: Gary’s last paycheck covered January’s rent – but since he didn’t get a paycheck on Friday, he can’t afford his utilities, car payment, or health insurance bill. His message to President Trump: “When you shutdown the government, you shut us down, too.”
text: Gary’s last paycheck covered January’s rent – but since he didn’t get a paycheck on Friday, he can’t afford his utilities, car payment, or health insurance bill. His message to President Trump: “When you shutdown the government, you shut us down, too.”

html: For weeks, I’ve been hearing from furloughed constituents across the East Bay who aren’t receiving paychecks and have no way to pay the bills. Constituents like Gary, who works for the Treasury Department and hasn’t been paid since Dec 31st.

text: There’s never been a woman, or a person of color, leading the Cannabis Caucus. That changed today – when I became the newest co-chair of the bipartisan Cannabis Caucus, with my colleagues @RepBlumenauer, @RepDaveJoyce, & @RepDonYoung.

html: Excited to have @RepBarbaraLee & @RepDaveJoyce join @repdonyoung and I on the Cannabis Caucus leadership team! We’re working to: End senseless prohibition Ensure restorative justice for those impacted by the war on drugs Advance research Expand access to vets
text:
Excited to have @RepBarbaraLee & @RepDaveJoyce join @repdonyoung and I on the Cannabis Caucus leadership team! We’re working to:

End senseless prohibition

Ensure restorative justice for those impacted by the war on drugs

text:
My heart is heavy as I mourn the loss of my dear friend Charles Brown - a brilliant and beautiful man, who was a pillar of our community. He passed into eternity on Thanksgiving Day.

May God bless his family, may his spirit live on, and may he rest in peace.

html: As a member of the funding committee on the VA, I am appalled that Trump’s @DeptVetAffairs is failing our veterans like this. html: Today we couldn’t be prouder to announce the winners of the inaugural #MBKCompetition our first investments in communities that'll accelerate impact, expand opportunity & obliterate systemic barriers our boys & young men of color face everyday. Meet them: http://Obama.org/MBKA/Communities …pic.twitter.com/mXfj16V6ME

html: Our future depends on all our young people, including our boys and young men of color, being able to achieve their dreams. Today, I’m proud to share @MBK_Alliance’s first investments in communities devoted to this mission. Get inspired:http://obama.org/MBKA/communities …

html: When #ShirleyChisholm was elected 50 years ago, she didn’t just open a path for herself – she blazed a trail for other women to follow. As we welcome the 116th Congress, I’m incredibly excited to work with so many incredible #UnboughtUnbossed women of color. Let’s get to work!pic.twitter.com/5er5abppQa

html: WINTER SPARE THE AIR ALERT IS IN EFFECT THRU FRI: Please limit outdoor activity as much as possible during this alert, and continue to listen to health information from local authorities. For more info visit: http://sparetheair.org  #ButteCountyFire #CampFirepic.twitter.com/Q9fzFP3DTW
